Package mgui.interfaces.pipelines.trees

Class PipelineTree

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JTree
mgui.interfaces.pipelines.trees.PipelineTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, PopupMenuObject, StaticPipelineListener
public class PipelineTree
extends javax.swing.JTree
implements PopupMenuObject, java.awt.event.MouseListener, StaticPipelineListener
Implements a tree interface for ModelGUI pipelines.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Andrew Reid
